Package view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • view.View
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EndView, ObjectView, QuizView, TitleView

    public abstract class View
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This is the abstract View class which all the views extend, this includes attributes that every view must have like dimmensions, time, GameObjects, and a CodeListener.
    Author:
    w Mathieu Mimms-Boyce, Andre Green, Devon Pirestani, Miguel Fuentes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
